text: Deeai! Aloho i godou hagadaumee, heia nia humalia gi digaula. Wanga ina godou mee gi digaula, hudee maanadu bolo ma ga lloo adu ono haga humalia gi goodou, gei godou hui ga llauehaa, gaa hai nia dama ni di God Aamua Huoloo. Idimaa, Mee e humalia gi digau ala hagalee danggee mo digau hai mee huaidu.
